name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Customer Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong background in **Python** and **SQL**, coupled with extensive cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. My capabilities include the effective management of customer success initiatives alongside project management, ensuring high-quality delivery in alignment with organizational goals. I leverage my proficiency in **API** and **Web Services** to design seamless integrations while maintaining a strong focus on **Data Privacy**, **DLP**, and compliance with regulations.
I excel at forging strong interpersonal relationships and fostering collaboration within teams, driving projects forward as a dedicated team player. Additionally, my experience in developing high-performance solutions utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, arms me with a versatile skill set ideal for addressing complex challenges in dynamic environments. Having led the development of enterprise platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities, I am well-versed in MLOps workflows with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
